CustomField.formula: 'Enquiry Type: ' + TEXT(Enquiry_Type__c) + BR() + 'Business Name: ' + Business_Name__c + BR() + 'Receiver Name: ' + StarTrack_Receiver_Name__c + BR() + 'Phone: ' + Phone__c + BR() + 'Delivery Instructions: ' + DeliveryInstructions__c + BR() + 'ATL: ' + IF(ATL__c = true, 'Checked', 'Unchecked') + BR() + BR() + 'Address Line 1: ' + Delivery_Address_Line_1__c + BR() + 'Address Line 2: ' + Delivery_Address_Line_2__c + BR() + 'Suburb: ' + Delivery_Address_Suburb__c + BR() + 'State: ' + Delivery_Address_State__c + BR() + 'Post Code:' + Delivery_Address_Post_Code__c + BR() + 'DPID: ' + Delivery_Address_DPID__c
CustomField.label: StarTrack Case Task Description
